Drinking Water Reports - City of Hackberry

[Skip to content](https://cityofhackberry.net/drinking-water-reports/#content)

You may pay-by-phone using our automated phone number 24/7 @ 1.888.409.2849. Please have your account number and card information. WE DO NOT ACCEPT ACH PAYMENTS.

You may pay-by-phone using our automated phone number 24/7 @ 1.888.409.2849. Please have your account number and card information. WE DO NOT ACCEPT ACH PAYMENTS.

Drinking Water Reports
----------------------

###### CCR 2022

[Download Now](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/CCR-2022.pdf)

###### Public Notice 05012021-05312021 RTCR

[Download Now](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Public-Notice-05012021-05312021-RTCR.pdf)

![Process of checking the purity level of tap water using water TDS meter tool, close up. Device shows 198 ppm of contaminant level, which is considered the typical value. At home in the kitchen.](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Depositphotos_356776448_S.jpg "Process of checking the purity level of tap water using water TDS meter tool, close up. Device shows 198 ppm of contaminant level, which is considered the typical value. At home in the kitchen")

[![city of Hackberry (1)](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/city-of-Hackberry-1.png "city of Hackberry (1)")](https://cityofhackberry.net/)

Hackberry is a town in Denton County,  
Texas, United States. The population was  
2,973 in 2020.

##### Hours of Operation

### Mon-Fri

08:00 AM-05:00 PM

### Sat-Sun

Closed

##### Contact Us
